titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to improve the deduction for qualified business income.
Small Business Tax Fairness Act
Small Business Tax Fairness Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Small Business Tax Fairness Act
This bill revises the tax deduction for qualified business income to limit eligibility for such deduction to individual taxpayers. It also modifies rules for calculating the amount of such deduction and limitations on it.
